amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for salaries and expenses of the Office of Terrorism and Financial Intelligence by $5 million and to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of Administration of Treasury Inspector General for Tax by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for salaries and expenses of the Office of Terrorism and Financial Intelligence by $5 million and to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of Administration of Treasury Inspector General for Tax by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Grayson.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
